prompt: Ray Liotta was a renowned American actor, best known for his roles in "Field of Dreams" and "Goodfellas". Please write a short biography of Ray Liotta.

Ray Liotta, born on December 23, 1954, in Newark, New Jersey, is a highly acclaimed American actor. With a career spanning over four decades, Liotta has established himself as one of the most versatile and talented actors of his generation.

Liotta's early life was marked by a passion for the performing arts. He began acting in school plays and local productions, eventually earning a scholarship to the University of Miami, where he studied drama. After graduating, Liotta moved to New York City to pursue a career in acting, landing his first role on the soap opera "Another World" in 1978.

Liotta's breakthrough role came in 1986 when he played the iconic character of Shoeless Joe Jackson in the critically acclaimed film "Field of Dreams." His powerful performance earned him widespread recognition and paved the way for future roles.

In 1990, Liotta starred in Martin Scorsese's gritty crime drama "Goodfellas," alongside Robert De Niro and Joe Pesci. His portrayal of Henry Hill, a mobster turned FBI informant, received widespread critical acclaim and cemented his status as a leading man in Hollywood.

Throughout his career, Liotta has appeared in a wide range of films, from the psychological thriller "Unlawful Entry" to the action-packed blockbuster "Blow." He has worked with some of the most renowned directors in the industry, including Scorsese, Oliver Stone, and Francis Ford Coppola.

Liotta has been recognized with numerous award nominations, including an Academy Award nomination for his role in "Goodfellas." He has also been honored with a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame and has been named one of the greatest actors of all time by several reputable sources.

In addition to his film work, Liotta has also made appearances on television, including roles on popular shows like "ER" and "Shameless." He has also lent his voice to several animated films and video games.

Throughout his illustrious career, Ray Liotta has demonstrated his ability to take on complex and challenging roles, consistently delivering performances that have captivated audiences worldwide.
